Sentence.value: The acid-fast stain is a laboratory test that determines if a sample of tissue, blood, or other body substance is infected with the bacteria that causes tuberculosis and other illnesses.
Sentence.pattern_crowdsource: The [[acid-fast stain|C0200974]] is a [[laboratory test|C0022885]] that determines if a sample of tissue, [[blood|C0005767]], or other body substance is infected with the [[bacteria|C0004611]] that causes [[tuberculosis|C0041296]] and other illnesses.
